description:
***Updates v1.2.4***
 * Fixed calculation-order Bug
 * Differentiations (beta)

The ultimate calculator for your Pre or Pixi !
Solve equations and calculations or create graphs and tables with the fastest function plotter you've ever seen on a mobile device. Zoom and move the graph like a picture, input the expressions with the on-screen keyboard or with the one from your device, extend it with custom features and much more!

The calculator comes with over 20 functions:
 * trigonometry
 * logarithms
 * comparisons
 * random numbers
 * ....
You can generalize everything, solve it with the Newton - Resolve Method according to X, create a table of values or a graph with multiple functions at once. Browse the history with the back and forward gestures. Differentiate your functions and display them with the original version. Create your own favorites as 2nd assignment and your own functions & variables.

This calculator is extremely efficient, complex calculations need only a fraction of a second, too. The values range from -2 ¹⁰²⁴ -1 to 2¹⁰²⁴ -1, which is many times more than the number of atoms in the universe !
